content.prompt: The narrator’s comparison of Miss Noble to a “tiny timid quadruped” near the end of the passage suggests that she is a

choices.label: harmless creature who is acting in part out of instinct
vulnerable animal who is endangered by predators
frail person who is indulged by others as if she were a pet
frightened individual who is seeking an opportunity to escape

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
